tags.name: My account
tags.description: Account routes provide functionality for managing user profile for the end user to interact directly with access tokens.

patch.description: Update profile for the user, only the fields that are passed in will be updated.

name.description: The new name for the user.

avatar.description: The new avatar for the user, must be a URL.

username.description: The new username for the user, must be a valid username and unique.

422.description: The username is already in use.

patch.description: Update other profile for the user, only the fields that are passed in will be updated, to update the address, the user must have the address scope.

familyName.description: The new family name for the user.

givenName.description: The new given name for the user.

middleName.description: The new middle name for the user.

nickname.description: The new nickname for the user.

preferredUsername.description: The new preferred username for the user.

profile.description: The new profile for the user.

website.description: The new website for the user.

gender.description: The new gender for the user.

birthdate.description: The new birthdate for the user.

zoneinfo.description: The new zoneinfo for the user.

locale.description: The new locale for the user.

address.description: The new address for the user.

post.description: Update password for the user, a logto-verification-id in header is required for checking sensitive permissions.

password.description: The new password for the user.

403.description: Permission denied, the verification record is invalid.

post.description: Update primary email for the user, a logto-verification-id in header is required for checking sensitive permissions, and a new identifier verification record is required for the new email ownership verification.

email.description: The new email for the user.

newIdentifierVerificationRecordId.description: The identifier verification record ID for the new email ownership verification.

204.description: The primary email was updated successfully.

400.description: The new verification record is invalid.

403.description: Permission denied, the verification record is invalid.

delete.description: Delete primary email for the user, a verification-record-id in header is required for checking sensitive permissions.

204.description: The primary email was deleted successfully.

post.description: Update primary phone for the user, a logto-verification-id in header is required for checking sensitive permissions, and a new identifier verification record is required for the new phone ownership verification.

phone.description: The new phone for the user.

newIdentifierVerificationRecordId.description: The identifier verification record ID for the new phone ownership verification.

204.description: The primary phone was updated successfully.

400.description: The new verification record is invalid.

403.description: Permission denied, the verification record is invalid.

delete.description: Delete primary phone for the user, a verification-record-id in header is required for checking sensitive permissions.

204.description: The primary phone was deleted successfully.

post.description: Add an identity (social identity) to the user, a logto-verification-id in header is required for checking sensitive permissions, and a verification record for the social identity is required.

newIdentifierVerificationRecordId.description: The identifier verification record ID for the new social identity ownership verification.

delete.description: Delete an identity (social identity) from the user, a logto-verification-id in header is required for checking sensitive permissions.

get.description: Get MFA verifications for the user.

200.description: The MFA verifications were retrieved successfully.

post.description: Add a MFA verification to the user, a logto-verification-id in header is required for checking sensitive permissions.

type.description: The type of the MFA verification.

newIdentifierVerificationRecordId.description: The identifier verification record ID for the new WebAuthn registration verification.

name.description: The name of the MFA verification, if not provided, the name will be generated from user agent.

type.description: The type of the MFA verification, for TOTP, one user can only bind one TOTP factor.

secret.description: The TOTP secret for the MFA verification. Use the generate endpoint to create a secret, and verify the generated code with the user before binding to make sure the user has setup the secret in their authenticator app.

post.description: Generate a TOTP secret for the user.

200.description: The TOTP secret was generated successfully.

patch.description: Update a MFA verification name, a logto-verification-id in header is required for checking sensitive permissions. Only WebAuthn is supported for now.

name.description: The name of the MFA verification.

200.description: The MFA verification name was updated successfully.

parameters.name: verificationId
parameters.description: The ID of the MFA verification to delete.

delete.description: Delete an MFA verification, a logto-verification-id in header is required for checking sensitive permissions.

204.description: The MFA verification was deleted successfully.
